EmailTemplate.description: Thank you for visiting us at HELI-EXPO 2017
EmailTemplate.name: 2017 HELI-EXPO.2017 HELI-EXPO Thank You
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for visiting Honeywell at HELI-EXPO 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Thank you for stopping by our booth at HELI-EXPO 2017.
Honeywell is proud to offer solutions to fit your mission requirements. From advanced avionics to mechanical systems, our solutions are proven to be highly reliable and capable, providing the technology to perform in any airspace environment. If you have additional questions about our products or services, please contact:
Rick Buchanan Richard.Buchanan@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:richard.buchanan@honeywell.com]]> 480-231-9924 Mobile You can also learn about our helicopter offerings on aerospace.honeywell.com <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>, download <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/pages/virtual-reality-apps-by-honeywell]]> our virtual reality helicopter app or subscribe to our Helicopter Newsletter <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2017/february/helicopter-newsletter-q1-2017]]>.
